location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No.347 from William Muir, Secretary to the Government of India, Foreign Department Political, Simla to The Acting Secretary to the Government of Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter regarding information supplied by Lewis Pelly on the practicality of the proposed extension of the Mekran line of Telegraph.The verso of the folio records that copies of the letter were made by Patrick Ryan, Assistant Secretary for the Secretary to Government and James Charles Edwards, Uncovenanted Assistant Resident in the Persian Gulf.
